select b.id as id,a.user_name as username,b.phoneNumber as phoneNumber,b.email as email,b.sex as sex, b.personality_signature as personalitySignature,b.birth_day as birthDay,b.occupation as occupation, b.location as location,DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')as createDate,b.nickname as nickname,a.ban as ban from users a left join user_info b on a.id = b.user_id where a.role = 'user'
AND a.user_name like CONCAT('%',#{username},'%')
